entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning.
